aka: The Poet In the Labyrinth of Time
this_title: Гео Милев в лабиринта на времето
trans_title: The Poet In the Labyrinth of Time
introduction: February 1954. In the City of Sofia and its surrounding lands ten mass graves were discovered with over 500 dead bodies inside. The expertise revealed that the death was violent. The year of the massacre? 1925. One of the graves, the one located near the Ilientsi barracks, contained a glass eye. The eye of the poet Geo Milev.
chinese_title: Гео Милев в лабиринта на времето
